mapper.sql: id, out_gate_id, terminal_id, except_start_time, current_collect_time, create_time, update_time
mapper.update:
UPDATE refri_house_summary_log
out_gate_id = #{outGateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
terminal_id = #{terminalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
except_start_time = #{exceptStartTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
current_collect_time = #{currentCollectTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
